agent-architect.description: Winston - Use for system design, architecture documents, technology selection, API design, and infrastructure planning

agent-bmad-the-creator.description: The Creator - Use for creating new agents, expansion packs, and extending the BMAD framework

agent-po.description: Sarah - Use for backlog management, story refinement, acceptance criteria, sprint planning, and prioritization decisions

agent-analyst.description: Mary - Use for market research, brainstorming, competitive analysis, creating project briefs, initial project discovery, and documenting existing projects (brownfield)

agent-qa.description: Quinn - Use for senior code review, refactoring, test planning, quality assurance, and mentoring through code improvements

agent-bmad-master.description: BMad Master - Use when you need comprehensive expertise across all domains or rapid context switching between multiple agent capabilities

agent-ux-expert.description: Sally - Use for UI/UX design, wireframes, prototypes, front-end specifications, and user experience optimization

agent-sm.description: Bob - Use for story creation, epic management, retrospectives in party-mode, and agile process guidance

agent-pm.description: John - Use for creating PRDs, product strategy, feature prioritization, roadmap planning, and stakeholder communication

agent-dev.description: James - Use for code implementation, debugging, refactoring, and development best practices
